set.name: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. −2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. −7: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Reach When Cloudthresher enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Evoke {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zendikar's elves have developed innovative methods to mitigate the effects of the Roil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Desmera blinded her seers so that her beauty would be the last image burned in their memories. The act only deepened their insight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Jaddi Lifestrider enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each creature tapped this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature's arms encircle all who are willing to draw close.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar will not surrender, and neither can we."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Nissa's Chosen would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once, Nissa selected worthy fighters to defend the Joraga. Now, she gathers forces to defend all of Zendikar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roam as you will, your roots remain in the strong earth of your Rising."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Hydra. If that land is a Forest, put two +1/+1 counters on Oran-Rief Hydra instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Oran-Rief Invoker gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The world was not hostile to us - we were beneath its notice, and presented no danger." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Saddleback Lagac enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good lagac will carry you through thick and thin. A bad one . . . well, it's a tasty dinner." - Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Scythe Leopard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eldrazi are not the leopard's preferred prey, but they are better than no prey at all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The horizon is the perpetual ideal, the constant promise of hope." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Thicket Elemental enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most elegant solutions are found in nature. You just have to know where to look."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token. Evoke {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through the waves of Eldrazi attacks, the Murasan jungles seemed to regrow as soon as they were destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It carries the hopes of Zendikar's embattled wilds on its mighty boughs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. When Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield, you may look at the top five cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one basic land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in any order. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hideaway 4 (When this land enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.) Mosswort Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. −3: Destroy target creature. −8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will secure my revenge on Zendikar one soul at a time." - Ob Nixilis

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier." - Ob Nixilis

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avoid anything that scuttles, scrabbles, or shambles." - Opar, veteran guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Carrier Thrall dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering." - Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise." - Ob Nixilis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Despoiler of Souls can't block. {B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rats and vultures devour. It desecrates.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One little word was all it took. The world shook as I said it. The doom of Zendikar was here at last." - Ob Nixilis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize." - Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Priest of the Blood Rite enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord. Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Confront it at your own peril, for it will confront you for its own amusement.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Setting foot in their muck is an open invitation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B}.) Leechridden Swamp enters the battlefield tapped. {B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate only if you control two or more black permanents.
